title: Alinea Incise ?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623032331im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_6543.jpg)

I think the font for this is Alinea Incise Bold. I'm not sure bold is strong enough though.

Is this Alinea Incise?  
Is there a black version?

Thanks,  
Jeremy
author: adpressinc

comments.content: I’d rather say it’s [Optima Bold or Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623032331/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/), squooshed.
Optima Black Squooshed worked perfectly! Thanks!
